mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NO, ADMIN_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{adminNo}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT N.NO, A.ID AS ADMIN_NO, N.TITLE, N.CONTENT, N.FIXE_YN, SUBSTR(WRITE_DATE, 1, 8) AS WRITE_DATE, N.DELETE_YN FROM NOTICE N INNER JOIN ADMIN A ON A.NO = N.ADMIN_NO WHERE N.NO = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET WRITE_DATE = SYSDATE, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE NO = #{no}

SELECT P.NO, M.NICK AS CREATOR, CONCAT(SUBSTR(P.TITLE, 1, 28),'...') AS TITLE, C.NAME AS CATEGORY, TO_CHAR(P.PRICE,'fm999,999,999,999') AS PRICE, P.START_DATE, P.END_DATE, P.STATUS FROM PROJECT P LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON P.CREATOR = M.NO JOIN PRJ_CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY = C.NO
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT P.NO, P.TITLE, C.NAME AS CATEGORY, TO_CHAR(P.PRICE,'fm999,999,999,999') AS PRICE, P.START_DATE, P.TIME, P.END_DATE, P.URL, P.SUMMARY, P.STATUS FROM PROJECT P LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = P.CREATOR JOIN PRJ_CATEGORY C ON C.NO = P.CATEGORY WHERE P.NO = #{no}

SELECT R.NO, M.NICK AS REPORTER, T.TITLE, R.CONTENT, R.PRJ, SUBSTR(R.ENROLL_DATE, 1, 8) AS ENROLL_DATE, R.STATUS FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.NO = M.NO JOIN REPORT_TITLE T ON R.TITLE = T.NO
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ORDER BY NO DESC
